attributes.additional_details:
Fair and free elections require all voters to have reasonable access to the same information from a campaign so that they can make an informed decision when casting their vote.

It should be made illegal to target political campaign messages to different individuals or groups of people based on their psychological, ethnic, leisure, education, employment, health, financial or other individual characteristic.
attributes.background: The same TV/Radio party political broadcast is be heard by all, in a digital world different campaign messages can be sent to different types of people, this makes it almost impossible for one group of people to see that a party is privately making different election promises to other people.
